creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Reloading this page results in a blank page
http://demo.wyona.org/lenya/computerworld/introduction.html

The source of the blank page looks like this:

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1"></HEAD>
<BODY></BODY></HTML>
This seems to be an intermittent problem.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
I also have the same problem with the New OSCOM Times demo:
http://demo.wyona.org/lenya/notimes/introduction.html
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: Sometimes this even happens for the first access to the page.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
The problem gets worse over time. There seems to be some kind of resource leak.

I now only receive blank pages.

The blank pages seem to be a symptom of a memory leak problem which occurs on 
Tomcat 4.1.24 and previous versions. In the end Lenya is left in a useless 
state.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
When the system is in or before the "blank pages" state another strange effect 
can be encountered.

Accessing a Reader's View page delivers an Editor's View login page such as the 
following. That seems to happen once - later requests result in blank pages.

---
OSCOM - LOGIN 

Request for protected uri: /lenya/oscom/index.html 
Current username: lenya
Last Authenticator: default (default) 

NOTE: try user "lenya" and password "levi" 
---
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
